SEARCH
Package Menu.CommentHandler.Interfaces

Interface IDeleting

All Known Implementing Classes:
StudentDeleteEnquiry, StudentDeleteSuggestion
public interface IDeleting
The `IDeleting` interface defines a contract for deleting comments from a camp. Classes that implement this interface must provide an implementation for deleting comments.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    deleteComment(User user, Comment comment, Camp camp)
    Deletes a comment from a camp by a user.

  • Method Details

    • deleteComment

      void deleteComment(User user, Comment comment, Camp camp)
      Deletes a comment from a camp by a user.
      Parameters:
      user - The user who is deleting the comment.
      comment - The comment to be deleted.
      camp - The camp from which the comment is being deleted.
